UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Peptide inhibition of human cytomegalovirus infection.
Literature.Author: Melnik LI, Garry RF, Morris CA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human cytomegalovirus (HCMV)(90-100% Inhibition=100µM),Human cytomegalovirus (HCMV)(90-100% Inhibition=50µM),Human cytomegalovirus (HCMV)(60-70% Inhibition=2.5µM)
